__e: I assume your wives are not with you, as the title of our piece is sufficient to strike terror in their hearts and cause them to remain at home in their kitchens, where they belong.
You called me on this case to identify and silence the Voice of Terror and to circumvent the unknown plan behind it.
Now, when they read about us, it's nothing but terror and violence.
I saw terror in the other women's eyes, too, before I killed them with this.
"The terror in our town has found a new victim."
There you are. Thank you. Don't shoot till you see the red veins in their eyes.
Hail he who has come from the skies to deliver us from the terrors of the deadites!
What they had not reamed was... my father had made his land into a pattern... of reservoirs... because he was terrified of fire.
He who is prophesied to fall from the heavens and deliver us from the terrors of the Deadites.

But that the dread of something after death...

I know it isn't real, but the terror is real.
